31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KOBJ_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KOBJ_H_
33
34#include <sys/types.h>
35#include <sys/kmem.h>
36#include_next <sys/kobj.h>
37#ifdef AT_UID
38#undef AT_UID
39#endif
40#ifdef AT_GID
41#undef AT_GID
42#endif
43#include <sys/vnode.h>
44
45#define KM_NOWAIT 0x01
46#define KM_TMP 0x02
47
48void kobj_free(void *address, size_t size);
49void *kobj_alloc(size_t size, int flag);
50void *kobj_zalloc(size_t size, int flag);
51
52struct _buf {
53 void *ptr;
54 int mounted;
55};
56
57struct _buf *kobj_open_file(const char *path);
58int kobj_get_filesize(struct _buf *file, uint64_t *size);
59int kobj_read_file(struct _buf *file, char *buf, unsigned size, unsigned off);
60void kobj_close_file(struct _buf *file);
61
62#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KOBJ_H_ */
63
